alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 12:27AM EST until January 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Delaware... White Clay Creek Near Newark affecting New Castle County. For the White Clay Creek...including Newark...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White Clay Creek near Newark. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding begins into adjacent open fields. At 13.3 feet, Delaware Route 7, Stanton Christiana Road, begins to flood. At 13.5 feet, Businesses on Delaware Route 7 begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 15.1 feet amd cresting. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 AM EST Wednesday was 15.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to crest at 15.2 feet early this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early this morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.4 feet on 10/01/2010. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (12 am) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Stg Time Date White Clay Creek Newark 13.0 15.1 Wed 12 a 6.0 MSG 15.2 1am 1/10 &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1100 AM EST.
